[bq="SquiggyBomb"]So what is currently your favorite anime opening?[/bq]
Surprisingly, Nichijou's OPs aren't the only answers in this case. Sure, I love "Hyadain no Kakakata Kataomoi-C":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UNYRfbT8QUU and "Hyadain no Joujou Yuujou":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LB7kQN6uNok but I like other anime OPs as well.

There's "Tank!,":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n6jCJZEFIto "Red Fraction":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IOmNWL5nzE4 (mostly for how hilariously engrish it is, but it is legitimately catchy), "Guren No Yumiyah,":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pn7dCgtwX2c and "Soramimi Cake":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C5E0-2Nm5KI (for being stupidly catchy)
